channel.title: Getting Started on Godot Lessons by KidsCanCode
channel.description: Recent content in Getting Started on Godot Lessons by KidsCanCode

item.title: What is a Game Engine?
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll look at how to start working in 3D in Godot. You’ll learn how to navigate in the 3D editor, how to create and manipulate 3D objects, and how to work with some of Godot’s essential 3D nodes, such as cameras and lighting.

item.title: Finding your way around
item.description: In this tutorial, we’ll look at how to start working in 3D in Godot. You’ll learn how to navigate in the 3D editor, how to create and manipulate 3D objects, and how to work with some of Godot’s essential 3D nodes, such as cameras and lighting.
